abstract: Massachusetts’ top securities regulator is investigating whether major banks, including Bank of America, Morgan Stanley and Citigroup improperly sold complex investment products to customers.
lead_paragraph: Massachusetts’ top securities regulator is investigating whether major banks, including Bank of America, Morgan Stanley and Citigroup improperly sold complex investment products to customers.

headline.main: Massachusetts to Investigate Sale of Investment Products

abstract: A fight is brewing over the role played by Bank of America in Rio Tinto‘s $38.1 billion offer for Alcan, The Daily Telegraph reported Friday. BofA is believed to have been part of the original funding consortium but withdrew last weekend leaving Rio’s advisers at Deutsche Bank to arrange last-minute financing.
lead_paragraph: A fight is brewing over the role played by Bank of America in Rio Tinto‘s $38.1 billion offer for Alcan, The Daily Telegraph reported Friday. BofA is believed to have been part of the original funding consortium but withdrew last weekend leaving Rio’s advisers at Deutsche Bank to arrange last-minute financing.

headline.main: Banks Fume Over BofA’s Role in Alcan Deal
